project.name: A.I.D.A.
project.description: Voice-enabled AI assistant for K-12 educators

voice_district_assistant.title: Voice Query District Policy
voice_district_assistant.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
voice_district_assistant.story: As a K-12 educator, I want to ask voice questions about district policies so that I can get instant, accurate answers while multitasking.
acceptance_criteria: I can activate voice interface with a simple voice command or button press
I can ask natural language questions about district policies
I receive accurate, district-specific answers within 2 seconds
The system provides source citations for all policy information
The voice interface works hands-free while I'm doing other tasks
The system maintains conversation context for follow-up questions
voice_district_assistant.business_value: Eliminates time-consuming policy searches, reduces administrative burden
success_metrics: >90% voice recognition accuracy in quiet environments
<2 second response time for voice queries
technical_requirements: Vapi integration for speech-to-text and text-to-speech
RAG pipeline with district document ingestion
Source citation system for all responses

voice_district_assistant.title: Voice Query Curriculum Guidelines
voice_district_assistant.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
voice_district_assistant.story: As a curriculum coordinator, I want to ask voice questions about curriculum guidelines so that I can quickly access alignment information without interrupting my workflow.
acceptance_criteria: I can ask about specific grade-level curriculum requirements
I can inquire about standards alignment and pacing guides
I receive detailed curriculum information with specific references
The system understands educational terminology and context
I can ask follow-up questions about implementation strategies
success_metrics: >70% weekly active usage by curriculum coordinators

voice_district_assistant.title: Voice Query Professional Development
voice_district_assistant.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
voice_district_assistant.story: As a teacher, I want to ask about available professional development opportunities so that I can quickly find relevant training without searching through multiple documents.
acceptance_criteria: I can ask about upcoming PD sessions and requirements
I can inquire about specific training topics and availability
I receive information about registration and prerequisites
The system can filter PD opportunities by subject area or grade level
voice_district_assistant.business_value: Increases PD participation and teacher development

ai_instructional_feedback.title: Upload Lesson Plan for AI Feedback
ai_instructional_feedback.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
ai_instructional_feedback.story: As a teacher, I want to upload my lesson plan and receive AI-powered feedback so that I can improve engagement and rigor in my instruction.
acceptance_criteria: I can upload lesson plans in multiple formats (PDF, Word, Google Docs)
I receive specific feedback on engagement strategies
I get suggestions for increasing instructional rigor
The feedback is pedagogically sound and aligned with best practices
I can ask follow-up questions about the feedback
The system provides actionable, specific recommendations
ai_instructional_feedback.business_value: Improves teaching effectiveness and student outcomes
success_metrics: 5+ lesson plans uploaded per teacher per month
>90% of feedback rated as helpful or very helpful

ai_instructional_feedback.title: Voice-Based Lesson Plan Feedback
ai_instructional_feedback.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
ai_instructional_feedback.story: As a teacher, I want to describe my lesson plan verbally and receive immediate feedback so that I can get quick insights while planning without stopping to type.
acceptance_criteria: I can describe my lesson plan through voice input
The system accurately transcribes my description
I receive voice feedback with specific suggestions
I can ask clarifying questions about the feedback
The system maintains context throughout the conversation
ai_instructional_feedback.business_value: Enables hands-free lesson planning and feedback

ai_instructional_feedback.title: District-Specific Feedback Alignment
ai_instructional_feedback.story: As a curriculum coordinator, I want AI feedback to align with our district's specific standards and initiatives so that teachers receive relevant, actionable guidance.
acceptance_criteria: Feedback references specific district standards and policies
Suggestions align with district curriculum frameworks
The system understands district-specific terminology and requirements
Feedback includes references to district resources and materials
ai_instructional_feedback.business_value: Ensures feedback relevance and district compliance

teacher_dashboard.title: Quick Voice Assistant Access
teacher_dashboard.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
teacher_dashboard.story: As a teacher, I want quick access to the voice assistant from my dashboard so that I can get help without navigating through multiple screens.
acceptance_criteria: Voice assistant is prominently displayed on the main dashboard
I can activate voice input with one click or voice command
The interface shows my recent voice interactions
I can see the status of my current voice session
The dashboard is optimized for mobile and tablet use
teacher_dashboard.business_value: Reduces friction in accessing core functionality

teacher_dashboard.title: Recent Interactions History
teacher_dashboard.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
teacher_dashboard.story: As a teacher, I want to see my recent voice interactions and feedback so that I can easily reference previous conversations and track my progress.
acceptance_criteria: I can view my last 10 voice interactions
Each interaction shows the question asked and response received
I can search through my interaction history
I can bookmark important interactions for future reference
The system shows timestamps and source citations
teacher_dashboard.business_value: Improves user experience and knowledge retention

teacher_dashboard.title: District Context Indicators
teacher_dashboard.role: Classroom teacher, curriculum coordinator, or department head
teacher_dashboard.story: As a teacher, I want to see my district context and available resources so that I know what information and tools are available to me.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows my current district and school information
I can see available document collections and knowledge bases
The system displays my access level and permissions
I can see recent district updates and announcements
The interface adapts based on my role and responsibilities
teacher_dashboard.business_value: Provides clear context and resource visibility

district_administrator.title: Teacher Usage Analytics
district_administrator.story: As a district administrator, I want to see how teachers are using A.I.D.A. so that I can measure ROI and identify areas for improvement.
acceptance_criteria: I can view usage statistics across all district teachers
I can see which features are most popular and effective
I can track teacher satisfaction and feedback scores
I can generate reports for district leadership
The system provides insights on time savings and efficiency gains
district_administrator.business_value: Demonstrates ROI and guides district investment decisions

district_administrator.title: District-Wide Document Management
district_administrator.story: As a district administrator, I want to manage which documents are available to teachers so that I can ensure they have access to current, relevant information.
acceptance_criteria: I can upload and manage district policy documents
I can control which documents are available to which user groups
I can track document usage and effectiveness
I can update documents and notify teachers of changes
The system maintains version control and audit trails
district_administrator.business_value: Ensures policy compliance and information accuracy

new_teacher.title: Onboarding Voice Assistant
new_teacher.story: As a new teacher, I want to use the voice assistant to learn about district policies and procedures so that I can quickly understand what I need to know without bothering colleagues.
acceptance_criteria: I can ask basic questions about district policies and procedures
The system provides clear, beginner-friendly explanations
I can ask follow-up questions for clarification
The system offers additional resources and next steps
I can save important information for future reference
new_teacher.business_value: Reduces onboarding time and improves new teacher confidence

new_teacher.title: Mentorship and Support
new_teacher.story: As a new teacher, I want to receive personalized guidance and support through the voice assistant so that I can improve my teaching effectiveness and confidence.
acceptance_criteria: The system provides personalized recommendations based on my experience level
I can ask questions about classroom management and teaching strategies
The system offers step-by-step guidance for common teaching tasks
I can track my progress and development over time
The system connects me with relevant resources and professional development
new_teacher.business_value: Improves new teacher retention and effectiveness

cross_cutting_stories.title: FERPA Compliance and Data Security
cross_cutting_stories.story: As any user of A.I.D.A., I want my data to be secure and FERPA-compliant so that I can trust the system with sensitive educational information.
acceptance_criteria: All data processing happens within the Convex deployment
No third-party sharing of authentication or document data
Complete audit trails for all data access and modifications
Role-based permissions for different user types
Clear data retention and deletion policies
cross_cutting_stories.business_value: Ensures legal compliance and user trust

cross_cutting_stories.title: Accessibility and Voice Interface
cross_cutting_stories.story: As a user with accessibility needs, I want the voice interface to work with assistive technologies so that I can fully participate in the A.I.D.A. experience.
acceptance_criteria: Voice interface works with screen readers and assistive technologies
All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Color contrast meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards
Clear audio feedback and visual indicators
Fallback options for voice interface failures
cross_cutting_stories.business_value: Ensures inclusive access for all users

cross_cutting_stories.title: Mobile-First Voice Experience
cross_cutting_stories.story: As a mobile user, I want the voice interface to work seamlessly on my phone or tablet so that I can access A.I.D.A. anywhere in my school.
acceptance_criteria: Voice interface optimized for mobile touch interactions
Responsive design that works on all screen sizes
Lighthouse performance score >90 on mobile
Touch-friendly voice controls and buttons
Offline capability for basic voice functions
cross_cutting_stories.business_value: Enables anywhere, anytime access to A.I.D.A.

user_experience.activation: First voice query within 24 hours of signup

phase_1_mvp.focus: Core voice assistant and instructional feedback
